products.title: Unicolour FR Luna Yellow Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Unicolour FR Luna Yellow Roller Blind in Yellow. Made to measure from £8.77 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Introuduce bright sunshine yellows into your interior styling. Light filtering & resistent to moisture. Our stunning Unicolour range has been designed specifically with office & work environments in mind. The collection includes everything from subtle muted shades to well satured bright colour options.
 
 Product ID: SDB-RBX2363 Fabric Colour: Luna Yellow Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Smooth Continuous-Looped Chain Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes
